summary:
Led in the development of fast-paced software teams, focusing on building the Dataworkz product.As a Full Stack Developer, i was played a key role in the end-to-end development of web applications, from front-end design to backend implementation. My expertise in both client-side and server-side technologies, coupled with my strong analytical and communication skills, will be instrumental in delivering successful projects and exceeding client expectations.
- With Figma designs provided by the UX expert, I utilized HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to build the user interfaces.
- Designed user interactions and experiences for the application using JavaScript.
- Integrated backend APIs with the UI using JavaScript.
- To address urgent customer needs, I developed backend REST APIs using Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, and MySQL.
